author: Jack Heretik
title: Movie Director Joss Whedon Compares Ivanka Trump to a Dog
text:
Movie director Joss Whedon compared Ivanka Trump to a dog in a tweet he sent Tuesday. Whedon, who directed the Avengers and identifies as a feminist, sent a tweet with a picture of Ivankaâ€™s husband, Jared Kushner, watching President Donald Trump signing documents.
â€œHey, keep your eyes on this fucking prize too,â€ Whedon wrote. â€œHeâ€™s a Voldemort in training, & unlike the Pekingese he married under, can play the long game.â€
Hey, keep your eyes on this fucking prize too. Heâ€™s a Voldemort in training, & unlike the Pekingese he married under, can play the long game pic.twitter.com/SNsuYdqlIp 
â€” Joss Whedon (@joss) January 24, 2017 

The message drew sharp criticism on Twitter for comparing Ivanka to a Pekingese, a dog breed. Breitbart highlighted a number of the responses sent to Whedon calling him out.
@joss The left used to be better than this. You used to be better than this.

@joss wow calling his wife a dog? I guess itâ€™s OK to demean women as long as you donâ€™t like them or their husbands, eh?

@joss Maybe next time just come out and say â€œbitchâ€. You ainâ€™t fooling anyone with â€œPekingeseâ€. Is this how you fight for womenâ€™s rights?

Whedon is no stranger to controversial comments. He once called for House Speaker Paul Ryan (R., Wis.) to be brutally murdered.
â€œViolence solves nothing. I want a rhino to fuck @ SpeakerRyan to death with its horn because itâ€™s FUNNY, not because heâ€™s a # GOPmurderbro ,â€ Whedon wrote on Twitter.
